ch0199_00_kogomi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Howdy!
You’re finally here! I was getting worried waiting
for you!
ch0199_00_kogomi/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on—let me test out how much tougher
you’ve gotten since the last time we met!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7101_0701_01_10: The Battle Arena is a test of the challengers’ will!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7101_0701_02_10:
Oh, but I mean...you can’t get through with just
brute force!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7101_0701_03_10:
’Cause it’s not just about winning or losing—
challengers are judged on how they used their
mind, skill, and body in battle!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7102_0701_01_10:
At the Battle Arena, they call me their leader!
Sounds pretty tough, doesn’t it?
ch0199_00_kogomi/7102_0701_02_10: Apparently, it’s because I’m the final boss!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7103_0701_01_10:
I like Fighting-type Pokémon, but I don’t specialize
in them or anything.
ch0199_00_kogomi/7103_0701_02_10:
Still though, the Fighting-type users here on Pasio
are letting me join their training sessions!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7103_0701_03_10:
It’s the best possible environment for me to train
my mind, skill, and body!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7104_0701_01_10:
You wanna know how to get stronger? Hmm...
Let’s see...
ch0199_00_kogomi/7104_0701_02_10:
If you want to get the most out of your own
abilities, I think it’s important to have a good
balance of mind, skill, and body.
ch0199_00_kogomi/7104_0701_03_10:
So I’d recommend training in a bunch of different
ways instead of focusing on just one!
ch0199_00_kogomi/7105_0701_01_10:
You’re actually pretty competitive, aren’t you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0199_00_kogomi/7105_0701_03_10:
There aren’t too many Trainers with a fighting
spirit as intense as mine!
ch0199_00_kogomi/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I’ve got something I’ve been
wanting to give you!
ch0199_00_kogomi/1701_0702_01_10:
I gifted you some of my energy, too! Keep on
getting stronger, OK?
ch0199_00_kogomi/2501_0701_01_10:
When I first met you, I thought you looked pretty
weak.
ch0199_00_kogomi/2501_0701_02_10:
But now that I’ve battled on the same team as
you, I know just how strong you are!
ch0199_00_kogomi/2501_0701_03_10:
I acknowledge your skill now, and I’m depending
on you too!
ch0199_00_kogomi/2501_0702_01_10:
You know, based on my experience with a Trainer
I met back in Hoenn...
ch0199_00_kogomi/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ve got a feeling that you’re gonna keep getting
stronger, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0199_00_kogomi/2511_0701_02_10:
...That’s how I let out my frustration when I lose
a battle that I was trying my hardest to win.
ch0199_00_kogomi/2511_0701_03_10: I never hide those feelings of regret!
ch0199_00_kogomi/2511_0701_04_10:
I think...that’s how I show respect to an opponent
who defeated me when I wasn’t holding back.
ch0199_00_kogomi/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s both Trainers taking the battle seriously that
gives it meaning in the first place!
ch0199_00_kogomi/2511_0702_02_10: And that’s why I get SO frustrated when I lose!
ch0199_00_kogomi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good mooorning! Come on, shout it out from your
gut! Let’s start another day with lots of energy!
ch0199_00_kogomi/3003_0701_01_10:
Gotta keep training as long as the sun’s up!
How about you join me?
ch0199_00_kogomi/3005_0701_01_10:
Hmm... I got a lot of good exercise today! Better
start prepping for some good rest next!
